div.head: David Towell Will
div.p:
In the name of God Amen. I David Towell of Charles
County in the province of Maryland being suck in body but of perfect
sense and memory thanks be to Almighty God do make and
ordaine this my last will and testament first bequeathing my
soule to Almighty God hoping through his blessed Deth and
passion that he will have merxy upon my soule and receive me in
his heavenly kingdom and what small Estate that he hath being
pleased to bestow upon me I am willing it should be
dispersed as folleth first I begal my soule to Almighty God and my
body to the earth and to be Beord whare my Executors thinks most
convenient

Item I give and beque unto my loving friends Thomas Allson and Edward
Ruckwod all my Estate both niall and personal to be equally divided
between them only Thomas Allson to have all housall left goods
in the house Expecting on I onne pot which the said Edward Ruckwood
his to hav which is the great pot amd doe make Thomas Allson
and the said Edward Ruckwood my hole and sole Executors of this my
last will and testament trusting and making voyd all forever
wills by me mad and doe ordaine this my last will and testament
as witness this my hand and seale this thenth day of July 1677 my house

I give to Thomas Allson his son.
Signed Sealed and Delivered
In the presense of us
Thomas Allson
his
Richard Richards
mark
John Belley
his mark
his
David M Towell
mark

On the back of the aforegoing was Endorsed the following probate (to will)
November 22d 1677

The Despossesion of Thomas Allson and John Belley saith that this is the last
will and testament of David Towell late of Charles County dead & was his oath
and deed and enter saith not sworne before me Zachria Wade as
it doth appear by my hand seal
3 sides
Zachria Wade
